headline.main: MUSSOLINI TOO BUSY TO HEAR U. S. PLEA; Envoy Unable to Hand Him Roosevelt Note--Nation Tense With War Fever

lead_paragraph: ROME, May 31--Events seem to be approaching the grand and terrible climax for Italy.
